column5: One smallmouth passed the old dam site 700+ times in a two week period during the pre construction study!  If this study shows that the new dam impedes fish passage, then London may finally get a fishway around it.  jjcanoe

I was at the dam last weekend looking around.  I thought it was kind of odd... I catch fish everywhere I fish the river but when I fished below the dam in the deep pool area I didn't see any sign of fish.  A few carp but they don't count
Sounds like that smallmouth was getting some on the side.
Sounds like he was getting some on BOTH sides!  jjcanoe
